SELECT A.id,A.name,A.pic,A.shop_id,A.price,A.source_url,A.description,A.create_time,A.last_update_time,A.is_under_shelf, B.name as shopName FROM qq_dingcan.t_goods A LEFT JOIN qq_dingcan.t_shop B ON A.shop_id = B.id WHERE A.is_under_shelf=0 AND A.is_deleted=0
AND A.name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{foodsName},"%")
AND B.name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{shopName},"%")
ORDER BY A.create_time DESC

SELECT A.id,A.name,A.pic,A.shop_id,A.price,A.source_url,A.description,A.create_time,A.last_update_time,A.is_under_shelf, B.name as shopName FROM qq_dingcan.t_goods A LEFT JOIN qq_dingcan.t_shop B ON A.shop_id = B.id WHERE A.is_deleted=0
AND A.name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{foodsName},"%")
AND B.name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{shopName},"%")
ORDER BY A.is_under_shelf ASC

SELECT A.id,A.name,A.pic,A.shop_id,A.price,A.source_url,A.description,A.create_time,A.last_update_time,A.is_under_shelf, B.name as shopName FROM qq_dingcan.t_goods A LEFT JOIN qq_dingcan.t_shop B ON A.shop_id = B.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
